name: Twitter - Dark and Purple
description:
Makes Twitter easy on the eyes. Makes the website easy to read during the night, but also adds some spice with the purple and pink colours.
If you enjoy the theme you can donate to my PayPal, but only if you really want.
additional_info:
If you find any bugs or have any suggestions make sure to post a comment in the discussion and I will make sure to add it or fix it in a future update!

Also if you want to change the website to fully purple change your personal theme in your profile to #4c1ea8.
